channel.title: Changing names of telports and descriptions?
channel.description:
How can I change the names of the teleports and their descriptions?
For example, the teleport is Varrock and description is a place for shops.
How can I change it to say Edgeville, a place for pking

item.title: Changing names of telports and descriptions?
item.dc:creator: @llamaman llamaman
item.description:
@llamaman wrote:

open texthandeler.java
search 180
Scroll down and change the name =)

Read full topic
item.source: Changing names of telports and descriptions?
